item.title: Ahmedabad to Shamlaji Temple: Distance, Best Route, Timings and Travel Guide
item.description: Shamlaji Temple, also known as Shamlaji Vishnu Mandir, stands as one of Gujarat’s most respected Vaishnavite pilgrimage sites. Positioned quietly along the Meshwo River and surrounded by the Aravalli Hills, this ancient temple attracts thousands of devotees throughout the year. Located around 120 km from Ahmedabad, it is an ideal one-day spiritual and cultural getaway. Here’s a detail
